Uses of Class
gui.WireNode

Packages that use WireNode
gui Contains the application's graphical user interface. 
 

Uses of WireNode in gui
 

Methods in gui that return WireNode
 WireNode WireImage.addNodeToFront(int x, int y)
          Adds a new node at the source end of the wire.
 WireNode WireImage.addNodeToBack(int x, int y)
          Adds a new node at the sink end of the wire.
 WireNode WireImage.splitPathSegment(int segment, int x, int y)
          Inserts a new node, splitting a segment of the path.
 

Methods in gui with parameters of type WireNode
 void WireImage.insertNodeAt(WireNode node, int position)
          Inserts a node, splitting a segment of the path.
 int WireImage.getPathPosition(WireNode node)
          Returns the position of a wire node in the path.
 void WireImage.removeNode(WireNode node)
          Removes a node from the wire.
